page.title: 15Brackley school day (boy)
page.content: Today, the 6th of June,I got to school at 8.50a.m.. The bell went at 8.55. We went into class and got out our reading books. Miss Brown (my class teacher) took the register to see who was here. Then she took the dinner register to check who was having school dinners, who was having sandwiches and who was going home.After that we went to assembly where our headmaster talked to us and told us a story. After assembly we had English and we wrote poems based on a poem by Adrian Mitchell called {I Like That Stuff}. After break we did maths. We were doing probems on percentages. The lunch bell went at 12.00. At 1.30 we had music and practised tunes which we had made up ourselves. After break we had a games lesson on cricket. We worked in pairs, throwing and catching to improve our fielding skills.The bell went at 3.55.
